Text:
Dear friends!
We're going to change the name and website. From now on, all information about new releases will be available at http://unmix.mp and here. Recently, we have corrected some errors in our releases, and we plan to merge and seed them together. All older versions will be seed for some time, though, and will gradually removed beginning from oldest. Thank you for your support seeding.

Please sorry for my bad english. Yep, I'm ashamed. ;)
